name: Auri's Tales
description: Join Auri in a 3D adventure to meet the King and the Queen of Solea: jump, explore, solve puzzles and help friendly characters to open the doors of the castle!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40Hz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT710 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40Hz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
